text: The women's quadruple sculls competition at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv took place at the Plovdiv Regatta Venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 9 September 2018 || 16:51 || Heats |- | Tuesday 11 September 2018 || 11:37 || Repechage |- | Thursday 13 September 2018 || 12:48 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 15 September 2018 || 10:26 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 13:01 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |- | 15:25 || Final C |} All times are Eastern European Summer Time (UTC+3) ==Results== ===Heats=== The three fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Marie-Cathérine The remaining boats were sent to the C final. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Elena Logofatu Georgiana Vasile Nicoleta Pascanu Simona Geanina Radis | align="left"| | 6:18.92 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Vasilisa Stepanova Olga Khalaleeva Iuliia Volgina Elena Zakhvatova | align="left"| | 6:20.49 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Ludovica Serafini Carmela Pappalardo Stefania Gobbi Chiara Ondoli | align="left"| | 6:21.10 | SA/B |- | 4 | align="left"|Marie Jacquet Camille Juillet Noémie Kober Anne-Sophie Marzin | align="left"| | 6:22.52 | FC |- | 5 | align="left"|Alena Schejbalová Helena Hlasová Miroslava Knapková Lucie Žabová | align="left"| | 6:23.27 | FC |- | 6 | align="left"|Marianne Madsen Hanna Inntjore Thea Helseth Inger Kavlie | align="left"| | 6:30.97 | FC |} ===Semifinals=== The three fastest boats in each semi advanced to the A final.
